meta.title: Home - Unionville-Chadds Ford School District

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home fsHasTheme2

div.p: UCFSD | Empower each student to succeed in life and contribute to society

a.span: Mobile Menu

input.name: q
input.title: search
input.style: width: 100%; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: -0.0625em 0px 0px; height: 1.25em; outline: none;

div.div: UNLOCKING THE POTENTIAL IN ALL OF USWe believe that the district runs at its best when all members of the community are working at their best. This vision is core to who we are and our approach to engagement with all stakeholders in this community.
QUALITY SERVICEUCFSD hires and retains the best educators who are supported by the region's finest in-house support staff - all of whom are committed to student success and service excellence.
Visit BoardDocsBoardDocs is an online portal to all UCFSD Board information including: agendas, minutes, videos, recaps, policies, calendars, member bios, contacts and more...

li.a: View Board Videos and Access Live Streaming Here

a.span: Close

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-5 fsCategory-19 fsTag-3 fsTag-7 fsTag-12 fsTag-15 fsTag-19 fsTag-33 fsTag-34 fsTag-35 fsTag-39 fsTag-45 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-48 fsTag-54 fsTag-56 fsTag-62 fsTag-98 fsTag-99 fsTag-131 fsFeaturedPost

img.alt: FOCUS-Coping Challenge COVID-19 THUMBNAIL

div.a: FOCUS Presents: Coping with the Challenges of COVID-19

div.p: FOCUS presents Coping with the Challenges of COVID-19, a two-part Zoom series covering the topics of "Managing Your Child's Anxiety - and Yours" and "Coping with Isolation, Uncertainty, & Loss". View event details and the link to register here!

a.span: about FOCUS Presents: Coping with the Challenges of COVID-19

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-5 fsCategory-19 fsTag-3 fsTag-34 fsTag-54 fsTag-62 fsFeaturedPost

div.title: School Bus Driver to Mask Maker PHOTO

img.alt: School Bus Driver to Mask Maker PHOTO

div.a: From School Bus Driver to Mask Maker

div.p: One of our UCF bus drivers was featured on NBC10 this morning! See Ms. Sikoutris’ special message in the video here!

a.span: about From School Bus Driver to Mask Maker

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-5 fsCategory-19 fsTag-3 fsTag-7 fsTag-35 fsTag-48 fsTag-54 fsFeaturedPost

div.title: UHS Logo with Graduation Diploma Rolled Up Icon

img.alt: UHS Logo with Graduation Diploma Rolled Up Icon

div.a: Important Information about Commencement and other Senior Events

div.p: Below is a three-tiered approach to honor the graduates. Each tier reflects the potential for a gradual scaling back of the UCFSD Pandemic Action Plan

a.span: about Important Information about Commencement and other Senior Events

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-5 fsCategory-19 fsTag-3 fsTag-7 fsTag-12 fsTag-15 fsTag-19 fsTag-33 fsTag-34 fsTag-35 fsTag-39 fsTag-45 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-54 fsTag-56 fsTag-62 fsTag-98 fsTag-99 fsTag-131 fsFeaturedPost

img.alt: COVID background with play button

div.p: Please enjoy this video message from Dr. Sanville, in which he addresses some of the questions you may have regarding the rest of the school year. We look forward to seeing everyone back online tomorrow for distance learning.

a.span: about Q&A with Dr. Sanville

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-5 fsCategory-19 fsTag-3 fsTag-7 fsTag-35 fsTag-48 fsTag-54 fsFeaturedPost

img.alt: support music award social tirle

div.a: Unionville High School Receives National Recognition

div.p: Unionville High School has been honored with the SupportMusic Merit Award from The NAMM Foundation for its outstanding commitment to music education.

a.span: about Unionville High School Receives National Recognition

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-5 fsCategory-19 fsTag-3 fsTag-7 fsTag-19 fsTag-35 fsTag-40 fsTag-47 fsTag-48 fsTag-54 fsTag-61 fsFeaturedPost

div.title: Important Message from Mr. Crater regarding UCFSD Athletics PLUS Athletics logo

img.alt: Important Message from Mr. Crater regarding UCFSD Athletics PLUS Athletics logo

div.p: View this important message regarding UCFSD Athletics from Mr. Crater, Supervisor of Athletics.

a.span: about Important Message Regarding UCFSD Athletics

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-5 fsCategory-19 fsTag-3 fsTag-7 fsTag-12 fsTag-15 fsTag-19 fsTag-33 fsTag-34 fsTag-35 fsTag-39 fsTag-45 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-54 fsTag-56 fsTag-62 fsTag-98 fsTag-99 fsTag-131 fsFeaturedPost

div.title: Coronavirus particles in background with exclamation point

img.alt: Coronavirus particles in background with exclamation point

div.a: Update from Dr. Sanville | PA Schools Closed for the Remainder of the School Year

div.p: A message from Dr. Sanville to the UCF community with an update on the current closure: Today Governor Wolf closed all Pennsylvania schools for the rest of the 2019-2020 school year. The news we have half-expected brings additional changes and challenges for all of us. View the full message here.

a.span: about Update from Dr. Sanville | PA Schools Closed for the Remainder of the School Year

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-5 fsCategory-19 fsTag-3 fsTag-7 fsTag-12 fsTag-15 fsTag-19 fsTag-33 fsTag-34 fsTag-35 fsTag-39 fsTag-45 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-54 fsTag-56 fsTag-62 fsTag-98 fsTag-99 fsTag-131 fsFeaturedPost

img.alt: DistanceLearningGuideContinuityOfEducationPlan THUMBNAIL FOR NEWS

div.a: Distance Learning Guide and Continuity of Education Plan

div.p: This guide was created to assist UCFSD staff, students and families navigate Distance Learning during the COVID-19 School Closure. Information outlining the District’s Continuity of Education Plan, grading, calendars, and resources are all featured in this guide for your convenience.

a.span: about Distance Learning Guide and Continuity of Education Plan

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-5 fsCategory-19 fsTag-3 fsTag-7 fsTag-12 fsTag-15 fsTag-19 fsTag-33 fsTag-34 fsTag-35 fsTag-39 fsTag-45 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-48 fsTag-54 fsTag-56 fsTag-62 fsTag-98 fsTag-99 fsTag-131 fsFeaturedPost

div.title: laptop, weights, paint palette, music and THINGS TO DO

img.alt: laptop, weights, paint palette, music and THINGS TO DO

div.a: Looking For Online and Wellness Activities?

div.p: Make sure you visit our Things To Do page under our COVID-19 Resources! Check out the videos featured in our Wellness Activity Series or spend some time enjoying a free online activity from our list of suggestions.

a.span: about Looking For Online and Wellness Activities?

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-5 fsCategory-19 fsTag-3 fsTag-7 fsTag-12 fsTag-15 fsTag-19 fsTag-33 fsTag-34 fsTag-35 fsTag-39 fsTag-45 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-54 fsTag-56 fsTag-62 fsTag-98 fsTag-99 fsFeaturedPost

div.title: District News March 2020 + UCF Logo + School bus driving in background + blue overlay on image

img.alt: District News March 2020 + UCF Logo + School bus driving in background + blue overlay on image

div.p: Check out the latest newsletter from Unionville-Chadds Ford School District! Our March 2020 edition includes COVID-19 resources and activities, the March school board meeting recap, a new video that depicts what an outstanding job our students and staff have been doing at distance learning, schedule reminders and more!

a.span: about District News | March 2020

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-5 fsCategory-19 fsTag-3 fsTag-7 fsTag-12 fsTag-19 fsTag-33 fsTag-34 fsTag-35 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-48 fsTag-54 fsTag-62 fsTag-98 fsTag-99 fsFeaturedPost

img.alt: Distance Learning Thumbnail

div.p: Students continue to learn and staff continue to provide meaningful education throughout Unionville-Chadds Ford despite being at home! Take a look at what our students and staff have been up to over the last two weeks!

a.span: about Distance Learning Video Montage

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-5 fsCategory-19 fsTag-3 fsTag-7 fsTag-12 fsTag-19 fsTag-33 fsTag-34 fsTag-35 fsTag-40 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-48 fsTag-54 fsTag-61 fsTag-62 fsTag-98 fsTag-99 fsTag-131 fsFeaturedPost

div.title: Wellness Activities Now Available on District YouTube Channel

img.alt: Wellness Activities Now Available on District YouTube Channel

div.a: Wellness Activities Now Available on District YouTube Channel

div.p: Take a look at the art and exercise videos available in the Wellness Activity Series playlist on our YouTube channel. These are various wellness activities that are occurring throughout the District, that our UCF families can access during their free time at home.

a.span: about Wellness Activities Now Available on District YouTube Channel

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-5 fsCategory-19 fsTag-3 fsTag-7 fsTag-12 fsTag-19 fsTag-33 fsTag-34 fsTag-35 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-48 fsTag-54 fsTag-62 fsTag-98 fsTag-99 fsFeaturedPost

img.alt: Social Distancing Across UCFSD | Infographic

div.p: High levels of social interaction at people's houses instead of the schools will only work against the widespread efforts currently in place attempting to flatten the curve. See the following social distancing guidelines below for simple, everyday decisions that can help our UCF community stay safe and healthy!

a.span: about Social Distancing Across UCFSD | Infographic

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-5 fsCategory-19 fsTag-3 fsTag-7 fsTag-12 fsTag-15 fsTag-19 fsTag-33 fsTag-34 fsTag-35 fsTag-39 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-54 fsTag-62 fsTag-98 fsTag-99 fsFeaturedPost

div.title: World Map with orange red overlay

img.alt: World Map with orange red overlay

div.p: We are asking our families to please read this important message from the Chester County Health Department regarding the 2019 Novel Coronavirus.

a.span: about Coronavirus Update for UCFSD Community

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-5 fsCategory-19 fsTag-3 fsTag-7 fsTag-12 fsTag-15 fsTag-19 fsTag-33 fsTag-34 fsTag-35 fsTag-39 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-54 fsTag-62 fsTag-98 fsTag-99 fsFeaturedPost

img.alt: FLL Group Photo and logo

div.a: UCFSD at FIRST LEGO League Regional Championships

div.p: UCFSD was well-represented at the FIRST-Mid Atlantic Pennsylvania-Southeast Region Championships with the following teams: Robostars and the Silver Wolves (Patton) and SkyShaper (Patton and Chadds Ford). The Silver Wolves won the First Place Champions Award and Third Place Robot Performance Award and will be competing at the World Festival in Detroit later this year.

a.span: about UCFSD at FIRST LEGO League Regional Championships

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-5 fsCategory-19 fsTag-3 fsTag-7 fsTag-12 fsTag-15 fsTag-19 fsTag-33 fsTag-34 fsTag-35 fsTag-39 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-54 fsTag-62 fsTag-98 fsTag-99 fsFeaturedPost

div.p: Check out the latest newsletter from Unionville-Chadds Ford School District! Our January 2020 edition includes featured stories and photos that highlight some of the great things our students are doing throughout the District, upcoming events and more!

div.title: Robotics team and UCF Robotics and two icons of robots

div.p: The robotics season is well underway with all qualifying tournaments happening throughout January and February. The UCF teams have performed extremely well and received different awards. See each teams’ accomplishments so far!

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-5 fsCategory-19 fsTag-3 fsTag-7 fsTag-12 fsTag-15 fsTag-19 fsTag-30 fsTag-33 fsTag-34 fsTag-35 fsTag-39 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-48 fsTag-54 fsTag-61 fsTag-62 fsFeaturedPost

div.title: National Merit Students Thumbnail for Post

img.alt: National Merit Students Thumbnail for Post

div.a: UHS Celebrates Record High National Merit Scholarship Semifinalists

div.p: The National Merit Scholarship Corporation recently announced that 22 Unionville High School students have been named National Merit Scholarship Semifinalists. This is the largest group of semifinalists to be recognized at Unionville High School.

a.span: about UHS Celebrates Record High National Merit Scholarship Semifinalists

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-5 fsCategory-19 fsTag-3 fsTag-7 fsTag-12 fsTag-15 fsTag-19 fsTag-33 fsTag-34 fsTag-35 fsTag-39 fsTag-46 fsTag-47 fsTag-54 fsTag-62 fsFeaturedPost

img.alt: One of the freshman's murals

div.a: Establishing the Freshman Brand Through Murals

div.p: UHS Freshmen were challenged to identify their brand and how the idea of Service Above Self might impact their brand. The end result, beautiful murals that expressed to the community what collectively the Class of 2023 can do to help others.

a.span: about Establishing the Freshman Brand Through Murals

section.class: fsElement fsCalendar fsSlideshow event-list fsItemCount_15 fsSlideshowHorizontal

div.a: FOCUS Presents "Managing Your Child's Anxiety - and Yours" (Zoom Session 1)

div.div: Unionville High School, 750 Unionville Rd, Kennett Square, PA 19348, USA
Charles F Patton Middle School, 760 Unionville Rd, Kennett Square, PA 19348, USA

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

div.p: All UCFSD school buildings and campuses will remain closed throughout the remainder of the 2019-20 school year, following Governor Wolf's announcement on April 9, 2020, closing all K-12 Pennsylvania schools in an effort to protect the health and safety of students and communities during the COVID-19 pandemic.

p.a: Please click here for the latest information regarding the COVID-19 pandemic.
